    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78861</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electrophilic substitution reaction of benzene with chlorine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrophile Ersatzreaktion des Benzols mit 
Chlor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction électrophile de substitution de 
benzène avec du chlore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação electrophilic da substituição do 
benzene com cloro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione elettrofila della sostituzione di 
benzene con cloro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρονιόφιλη αντίδραση αντικατάστασης του βενζολίου 
με το χλώριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción electrophilic de la substitución del 
benceno con clorina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the equation of the electrophilic substitution reaction of benzene with chlorine forming chlorobenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">benzene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorobenzene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrophilic substitution reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">halogen carrier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">halogenoarenes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Gleichung der 
elektrophilen Ersatzreaktion des Benzols mit dem Chlor, das 
Chlorbenzol bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'équation de la 
réaction électrophile de substitution du benzène avec du chlore 
formant le chlorobenzène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a equação da reação 
electrophilic da substituição do benzene com o cloro que dá forma 
ao clorobenzeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'equazione della 
reazione elettrofila della sostituzione di benzene con cloro che forma
il clorobenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εξίσωση της 
ηλεκτρονιόφιλης αντίδρασης αντικατάστασης του βενζολίου με το 
χλώριο που διαμορφώνει το μονοχλωροβενζόλιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ecuación de la 
reacción electrophilic de la substitución del benceno con la clorina
que forma el chlorobenzene.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Benzol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
